pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gerbv is a viewer for Gerber RS-274X files, Excellon drill files, and CSV pick-and-place files. (Note: RS-274D files are not supported.) The core functionality of gerbv is located in a separate library (libgerbv), allowing developers to include Gerber parsing/editing/exporting/rendering into other programs.
